document.full_text: the lower house of parliament overwhelmingly backed a measure on thursday that would ban burqa-type islamic dress in public. the bill must be passed by the senate in order to become law.
document.title: europe: belgium: parliament passes burqa ban
lines_and_colors: the lower house of parliament overwhelmingly backed a measure on thursday that would ban burqa-type islamic dress in public. the bill must be passed by the senate in order to become law.
